Articles.Content:
Hodo, what missiles are you using, as stated before, the zephyr missiles are more of an A-G weapon than an A-A, they are slow because of that. If you are using the AIM-9 missiles, then you shouldn't be having a speed issue. The way i use those missiles, they end up ALWAYS going faster than me (even at mach 2.5)

and why would you need a better gun than the 30mm or the 50 cal.? those server MY purposes very well.

when im dogfighting and the other plane is turning into me a slowerfiring gun is not that good and the 7.26 are preety op they can shoot down every small to medium fighter!

Hodo, what missiles are you using, as stated before, the zephyr missiles are more of an A-G weapon than an A-A, they are slow because of that. If you are using the AIM-9 missiles, then you shouldn't be having a speed issue. The way i use those missiles, they end up ALWAYS going faster than me (even at mach 2.5)

and why would you need a better gun than the 30mm or the 50 cal.? those server MY purposes very well.

It is possible that Hodo is referring to the Kerbender only when launched as a SAM. In that case it might be that it runs out of juice before it can pick up enough speed.

I know you are using them A-A, which probably allows them to accelerate from an already high speed. I can easily run a debug on the missile velocity to see where it's at, though I'm very sure with FAR I've been shot down by a SAM while going over 350m/s that's over mach 1.
InfininteDice my 7.62 mm gun keeps blowing itself up or shotting my own craft? any help would be glady apprectiated!

What do you mean with the last page? And I have no Idea what to do with log and debugs so I have no Idea what to do now.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64211-InfiniteDice-Skillful-Combat-Damage-Weapons-Mod/page123

I can easily run a debug on the missile velocity to see where it's at, though I'm very sure with FAR I've been shot down by a SAM while going over 350m/s that's over mach 1.

Made one small tweak here and there.

The missile is now moving at over 650 m/s @ 1000m - 1500m above sea-level before it tries to correct it's course to target. I think that's plenty fast to catch most aircraft. F-15's are mach 1.2 @ S-L and supposedly close to Mach 2.5 at 11,000m...

Expect the tweak in the next update.
I don't have a .cfg file for the bombs or rockets.

Guys I have a serious problem and I have no idea of how to fix, when I wan't place bombs and rockets on my plane they don't appear I just can't see them, I did try to use this mod with only the squad and the mod folder in the GameData folder but that didn't work, somebody know what I can do now?

I don't have a .cfg file for the bombs or rockets.

There is no cfg file for bombs or rockets.

Guys I have a serious problem and I have no idea of how to fix, when I wan't place bombs and rockets on my plane they don't appear I just can't see them, I did try to use this mod with only the squad and the mod folder in the GameData folder but that didn't work, somebody know what I can do now?

Did you read the instructions?

If not here.

Right click on the pylon chose the warhead type, then you choose the weapon type, then load ordinance.

There is no cfg file for bombs or rockets.

Did you read the instructions?

If not here.

Right click on the pylon chose the warhead type, then you choose the weapon type, then load ordinance.

I know that but nothing happends, no bomb no rockets

I know that but nothing happends, no bomb no rockets

did you even look at the post i linked to

Here is what I am talking about.

Note the speed of the aircraft, it is in MPH and is listed in MJ in m/s. Also note the air pressure.

Missile is fired and immediately lags behind the craft, and the aircraft continues to outrun the missile.

Second image of the first missile.

LAU rocket pod firing does the same thing.

I am sure it is FAR interacting with the missile and rocket objects, they have WAY to much drag and are unable to overcome it with their TWR.

did you even look at the post i linked to

Well first I did have a lot of mods but I deleted them until I only had the Squad and this mod in the GameData folder but that didn't help. Another problem is that I am not Experienced with Debugs so I have no idea what to look out for.
In .23.5 the NASAmission is a stock folder, but try setting up a fresh install with the latest curse download

In .23.5 the NASAmission is a stock folder, but try setting up a fresh install with the latest curse download

I did also try that with those 3 folder Squad, NASAmission and mod but that didn't help.
So you created a new ksp install, or just removed the other mods, what I suggest is trying a new install in case you changed something somewhere else by accident

Here is what I am talking about.

Note the speed of the aircraft, it is in MPH and is listed in MJ in m/s. Also note the air pressure.

I am sure it is FAR interacting with the missile and rocket objects, they have WAY to much drag and are unable to overcome it with their TWR.

Strange, I'm also using FAR during testing. BTW: Far or any other mod shouldn't be affecting the missiles,bombs or projectiles as they are not KSP parts - all aspects of their existence are handled by Skillful.

Just to be sure... do you have the latest file from Curse?

So you created a new ksp install, or just removed the other mods, what I suggest is trying a new install in case you changed something somewhere else by accident

I did just remove all the other mods.
